```{r}
apt<- read.csv("gu_data.csv")

apt_pca<- apt[,-1]

rownames(apt_pca)<- apt_pca$지역
apt_pca<- apt_pca[,-1]
apt_pca<- apt_pca[,-7]

price<- apt$평당가격

var(apt_pca)
diag(var(apt_pca))

pca.out<-prcomp(apt_pca, scale. = T)

biplot(pca.out, scale = F)
summary(pca.out)

screeplot(pca.out, type = "l")
```

```{r}
prc <- as.matrix(apt_pca) %*% pca.out$rotation
train1<- cbind(price, as.data.frame(prc))
str(train1)
prc.model <- lm(price~PC1+PC2+PC3, data = train1) # 회귀분석

summary(prc.model) #모델 평가
```
